resources.string:
Maiyaa mori, main Nahi Makhan Khayo


Bhor bhayo gaiyan ke paache, Madhuvan mohi pathayo

chaar prahar vanshivat bhatakyo, saanj pare ghar aayo


Main baalak bahiyan ko choto, chinko kidi vidhi payo

Gwaal baal sab bair pare hain, barbas mukh laptayo


Tu janani man kii ati mori, inke kahe patiyaayo

Jiya tete kachu bhed upjihai, jaani parayo jaayo


Yaha le apani lakuti kambaliyaa, bahutahi naach nachaayo

Jiya tete kachu bhed upjihai, jaani parayo jaayo

Surdas tab hanshi Yashodaa, lai ur-kanth lagaayo.

Hare Krishna Hare Krishna, 
Krishna Krishna Hare Hare


Hare Rama Hare Rama, 
Rama Rama Hare Hare

Aarti kunj bihari ki, shri girdhar krishna murari ki


Gale mein baijanti mala, bajave murali madhur bala 
Shravan mein kundal jhalakala


Nand ke anand nand lala 
Gagan sam ang kanti kali, radhika chamak rahi aali


Ratan mein thadhe banamali 
Bhramar si alak, kasturi tilak, chandra si jhalak


Lalit chhavi shyama pyari ki 
Shri giradhar krishnamuraari ki


Aarti kunj bihari ki , Shri girdhar krishna murari ki


Kanakmay mor mukut bilse, devata darsan ko tarse 
Gagan so suman raasi bares


Baje murchang, madhur mridang, gwaalin sang 
Atual rati gop kumaari ki Shri giradhar krishna murari ki


Aarti kunj bihari ki, Shri girdhar krishna murari ki

Jahaan se pragat bhayi ganga, kalush kali haarini shri ganga, 
Smaran se hot moh bhanga


Basi shiv shish, jataa ke beech, harei agh keech; 
Charan chhavi shri banvaari ki. Shri giradhar krishnamuraari ki…


Aarti kunj bihari ki, Shri girdhar krishna murari ki


Chamakati ujjawal tat renu, baj rahi vrindavan benu 
Chahu disi gopi gwaal dhenu


Hansat mridu mand, chandani chandra, katat bhav phand 
Ter sun deen bhikhaari ki, Shri giradhar krishnamuraari ki


Aarti kunj bihari ki, Shri girdhar krishna murari ki

Govind mero hai gopal mero hai


Shri banke bihari nandlal mero hai 
Govind mero hai gopal mero hai


Govind mero hai gopal mero hai 
Shri banke bihari nandlal mero hai 
Govind mero hai gopal mero hai


Govind mero hai gopal mero hai 
Shri banke bihari nandlal mero hai 
Govind mero hai gopal mero hai


Govind mero hai gopal mero hai 
Shri banke bihari nandlal mero hai 
Govind mero hai gopal mero hai

Bada Natkhat Hai Re Krishan Kanhaiya 
Ka Kare Yashoda Maiya Haan॥ Bada Natkhat Hai Re…॥


Dhoondhe Ri Ankhiyaan Use Chanhu Aur 
Jaane Kahan Chhup Gaya Nandkishor॥ Dhoondhe Ri Ankhiyaan…॥ 
Ud Gaya Aise Jaise Puravaiya, Ka Kare Yashoda Maiya Haan 
Bada Natkhat Hai Re…॥


Mere Jeevan Ka Tu Ek Hi Sapna 
Jo Koi Dekhe Tohe Samjhe Woh Apna॥ Mere Jeevan Ka…॥ 
Sabka Hai Pyara Bansi Bajaiya, Ka Kare Yashoda Maiya Haan 
Bada Natkhat Hai Re…॥


Aa Tohe Main Gale Se Laga Loon 
Laage Na Kisi Ki Nazar, Man Mein Chhupa Loon॥ Aa Tohe Main Gale…॥ 
Dhoop Jagat Hai Re Mamta Hai Chhaiyaan, Ka Kare Yashoda Maiya Haan 
Bada Natkhat Hai Re…॥

Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal


Aage Aage Gaiya Pichay Pichay Gwaal 
Beech-May Mero Madan Gopal 
Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal


Kaari Kaari Gaiya Goray Goray Gwaal 
Shyam Baran Mero Madan Gopal 
Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal


Ghaas Khaavay Gaiya Dhudh Peevay Gwaal 
Maakhan Khaavay Mero Madan Gopal 
Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal


Choti Choti Lakuti Chotay Chotay Haath 
Bansi Bajaaway Mero Madan Gopal 
Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal


Choti Choti Sakhiyaan Madhuban Baal 
Raas Rachaaway Mero Madan Gopal 
Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal


Choti Choti Gaiya Chotay Chotay Gwaal 
Chotoso Mero Madan Gopal

Yashomati maiya se bole nandlaala 
Radha kyon gori, main kyon kaala


Boli muskaati maiya, lalan ko bataaya 
Kaari andhiyaari adhi raat mein tu aaya 
Laadla Kanhaiya mera, kaali kamli waala 
Isiliye kaala


Boli muskaati maiya, sun mere pyaare 
Gori gori Radhika ke nain kajraare 
Kaale nainon waali ne aisa jaadu daala 
Isiliye kaala


Itne mein Radha pyaari ayi ithhalaati 
Maine na jaadu daala boli balakhaati 
Maiya Kanhaiya tera jag se niraala 
Isilie kaala

Mera aapki kripa se, sab kaam ho raha hai।
 
karte ho tum kanhaiya, mera naam ho raha hai.


mera aapki kripa se…


Patvaar ke bina hi meri naav chal rahi hai, 
hairaan hai zamaana manzil bhi mil rahi hai.


Karta nahin main kuch bhi sab kaam ho raha hai.


Mera aapki kripa se…


Tum saath ho jo mere kis cheez ki kami hai, 
kisi aur cheez ki ab darkaar bhi nahi hai.


Tere naam se gulaam ab gulfaam ho raha hai.


Mera aapki kripa se…


 Main to nahin hoon kaabil tera pyaar kaise paoon, 
Tooti hue vaani se gungaan kaise gaoon.


Mera aapki kripa se…

Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram 
Rama Naraynam Janaki Vallabham 
Kaun Kehta Hai Bhagvan Aate Nahi 
Tum Meera Ke Jaise Bulate Nahi


Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram 
Rama Naraynam Janakivallabham 
Kaun Kehta Hai Bhagvan Khaate Nahi 
Ber Shabri Ke Jaise Khilate Nahi


Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram 
Rama Naraynam Janaki Vallabham 
Kaun Kehta Hai Bhagvan Sote Nahi 
Maa Yashoda Ke Jaise Sulate Nahin


Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram 
Rama Naraynam Janaki Vallabham 
Kaun Kehta Hai Bhagvan Nachthe Nahi 
Gopiyo Ki Tarah Tum Nachathae Nahi


Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram, 
Rama Naraynam Janaki Vallabham, 
Naam Japate Chalo Kaam Karte Chalo 
Har Samay Krishna Ka Dhyaan Karte Chalo


Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram, 
Rama Naraynam Janaki Vallabham, 
Yaad Aayegi Unko Kabhi Na Kabhi 
Krishan Darshan To Denge Kabhi Na Kabhi


Achyutam Keshavam Krishna Damodaram 
Rama Naraynam Janaki Vallabham
